meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sociable or friendly, especially within a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The clubbiness of the team made everyone feel welcome and included.
meanings.sent2: The clubbiness of the book club members was evident in their warm greetings and shared love for reading.
meanings.sent3: The clubbiness of the penguin group was so strong that even the seals wanted to join in!
meanings.sent4: The clubbiness of the neighborhood watch group was like a warm blanket of safety and friendship.
meanings.sent5: The clubbiness of the knitting club was so strong, it felt like being wrapped in a cozy hug of yarn.

meanings.definition: A feeling of camaraderie or exclusivity among members of a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: There was a sense of clubbiness among the coworkers who always supported each other.
meanings.sent2: The clubbiness of the sports team was evident in their secret handshakes and inside jokes.
meanings.sent3: The clubbiness of the astronauts on the space station made them feel like they were part of an exclusive cosmic club.
meanings.sent4: The clubbiness of the biker gang was like a tight-knit family roaring down the highway together.
meanings.sent5: The clubbiness of the cooking club was so strong, it felt like being part of a delicious secret society.
